author: Michael Salfino
title: A Tale of Two Super Bowl Cities: Boston vs. Philadelphia - WSJ
text:
Philadelphia has never won a Super Bowl and has celebrated only one championship—by the 2008 Phillies—in the four major sports in the last 35 years.
The sports icon most closely connected to the city—Rocky Balboa—is a boxer who doesn’t actually exist. So it seems Philadelphia could really use some more sporting heroes.
By comparison, Boston...
